verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> also came to me,<WH559> saying,

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> you dwell<WH3427> in the midst<WH8432> of the rebellious<WH4805> house,<WH1004> who have eyes<WH5869> to see,<WH7200> and don't<WH7200> see, who have ears<WH241> to hear,<WH8085> and don't<WH8085> hear; for they are a rebellious<WH4805> house.<WH1004>

Therefore,<WH1121> you son of man,<WH120> prepare<WH6213> your stuff<WH3627> for moving,<WH1473> and move<WH1540> by day<WH3119> in their sight;<WH5869> and you shall move<WH1540> from your place<WH4725> to another<WH312> place<WH4725> in their sight:<WH5869> it may be they will consider,<WH7200> though they are a rebellious<WH4805> house.<WH1004>

You shall bring forth<WH3318> your stuff<WH3627> by day<WH3119> in their sight,<WH5869> as stuff<WH3627> for moving;<WH1473> and you shall go forth<WH3318> yourself at even<WH6153> in their sight,<WH5869> as when men go forth<WH4161> into exile.<WH1473>
Dig<WH2864> through the wall<WH7023> in their sight,<WH5869> and carry your stuff out that way.<WH3318>

In their sight<WH5869> you shall bear<WH5375> it on your shoulder,<WH3802> and carry it forth<WH3318> in the dark;<WH5939> you shall cover<WH3680> your face,<WH6440> so that you don't<WH7200> see the land:<WH776> for I have set<WH5414> you for a sign<WH4159> to the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478>

I did<WH6213> so as I was commanded:<WH6680> I brought forth<WH3318> my stuff<WH3627> by day,<WH3119> as stuff<WH3627> for removing,<WH1473> and in the even<WH6153> I dug<WH2864> through the wall<WH7023> with my hand;<WH3027> I brought it forth<WH3318> in the dark,<WH5939> and bore<WH5375> it on my shoulder<WH3802> in their sight.<WH5869>
In the morning<WH1242> came the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> to me,<WH559> saying,
Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> has not the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> the rebellious<WH4805> house,<WH1004> said<WH559> to you,<WH6213> What are you doing?

Say<WH559> to them,<WH559> Thus says the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> This burden<WH4853> concerns the prince<WH5387> in Jerusalem,<WH3389> and all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> among whom they are.<WH8432>
Say,<WH559> I am your sign:<WH4159> like as I have done,<WH6213> so shall it be done<WH6213> to them;<WH3212> they shall go into exile,<WH1473> into captivity.<WH7628>

The prince<WH5387> who is among<WH8432> them shall bear<WH5375> on his shoulder<WH3802> in the dark,<WH5939> and shall go forth:<WH3318> they shall dig<WH2864> through the wall<WH7023> to carry out<WH3318> thereby:<WH3680> he shall cover his face,<WH6440> because<WH3282> he shall not see<WH7200> the land<WH776> with his eyes.<WH5869>

My net<WH7568> also will I spread<WH6566> on him,<WH8610> and he shall be taken in my snare;<WH4686> and I will bring<WH935> him to Babylon<WH894> to the land<WH776> of the Chaldeans;<WH3778> yet shall he not see<WH7200> it,<WH4191> though he shall die there.
I will scatter<WH2219> toward every wind<WH7307> all who are around<WH5439> him to help<WH5828> him,<WH102> and all his bands; and I will draw out<WH7324> the sword<WH2719> after them.<WH310>
They shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh,<WH3068> when I shall disperse<WH2219> them among the nations,<WH1471> and scatter<WH6327> them through the countries.<WH776>

But I will leave<WH3498> a few<WH4557> men<WH582> of them from the sword,<WH2719> from the famine,<WH7458> and from the pestilence;<WH1698> that they may declare<WH5608> all their abominations<WH8441> among the nations<WH1471> where they come;<WH935> and they shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh.<WH3068>
Moreover the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,
Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> eat<WH398> your bread<WH3899> with quaking,<WH7494> and drink<WH8354> your water<WH4325> with trembling<WH7269> and with fearfulness;<WH1674>

and tell<WH559> the people<WH5971> of the land,<WH127> Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh<WH136> concerning the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> and the land<WH776> of Israel:<WH3478> They shall eat<WH398> their bread<WH3899> with fearfulness,<WH1674> and drink<WH8354> their water<WH4325> in dismay,<WH8078> that her land<WH776> may be desolate,<WH3456> and all that is therein,<WH4393> because of the violence<WH2555> of all those who dwell therein.<WH3427>
The cities<WH5892> that are inhabited<WH3427> shall be laid waste,<WH2717> and the land<WH776> shall be a desolation;<WH8077> and you shall know<WH3045> that I am Yahweh.<WH3068>
The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,
Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> what is this proverb<WH4912> that you have in the land<WH127> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> The days<WH3117> are prolonged,<WH748> and every vision<WH2377> fails?<WH6>

Tell<WH559> them therefore,<WH559> Thus says the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> I will make this proverb<WH4912> to cease,<WH7673> and they shall no more use it as a proverb<WH4911> in Israel;<WH3478> but tell<WH1696> them,<WH3117> The days are at hand,<WH7126> and the fulfillment<WH1697> of every vision.<WH2377>
For there shall be no more any false<WH7723> vision<WH2377> nor flattering<WH2509> divination<WH4738> within<WH8432> the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478>

For I am Yahweh;<WH3068> I will speak,<WH1696> and the word<WH1697> that I shall speak<WH1696> shall be performed;<WH6213> it shall be no more deferred:<WH4900> for in your days,<WH3117> rebellious<WH4805> house,<WH1004> will I speak<WH1696> the word,<WH1697> and will perform<WH6213> it,<WH1696> says the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069>
Again the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> behold,<WH1004> they of the house of Israel<WH3478> say,<WH559> The vision<WH2377> that he sees<WH2372> is for many<WH7227> day<WH3117> to come,<WH6256> and he prophesies of times that are far off.<WH7350>

Therefore tell<WH559> them,<WH559> Thus says the Lord<WH136> Yahweh:<WH3069> None of my words<WH1697> shall be deferred<WH4900> any more,<WH1697> but the word which I shall speak<WH1696> shall be performed,<WH6213> says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069>
